questions.quote: Well, maybe, he was talking to me. Was you talking to him? Because you was obviously talking to one of us. So what is it? Who?! Who was you talking to?!
He's proposing a plan where everyone in the city should wear name tags.
Alright, that's enough out of you, there's still three more games left in this series, my friend, and it's far from being over. Very far from being over.  Watch out!
What are you talking? Jeffrey works for the parks department!
Well it's not my fault. Seinfeld can't drive. How hard is it to follow somebody?
Because I'm not Latvian Orthodox. Her parents won't let her get involved with anyone who isn't Latvian Orthodox.
Well I, I'm in a bit of a quandary. I've misplaced my spectacles.
Oh yeah. In fact I like the picture so much I cropped out the nipple and am using as my health club ID.
